item.title: The springbok resemble the water of the sea
item.summary: The springbok resemble the water of the sea. There are so many of them the Dutch ('Boers') soon exhaust their ammunition shooting them.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-14
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: resemble the water of the sea
springbok, which resemble the water of the sea
the 'Boer's' gunpowder and gunshot are exhausted
their gunpowder and -shot are exhausted when they hunt springbok
guns used to hunt springbok which resemble the water of the sea
–powder and shot used by 'Boers' to hunt springbok, which resemble the water of the sea
